Text:
Definitely remember this series.  A Sienkiewicz classic.  Thanks for the ul.

I noticed that you're ul-ing nearly every Epic Comics titles published in the '80s and '90s, will you be ul-ing Dreadstar as well?  No need for Coyote as that one was uled recently.

Correct me if I'm wrong, but didn't Epic Comics make a comeback recently?

binderguy1 - It appears that Dreadstar is already on TPB and functioning:

https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/4555571/Dreadstar

If it's a long, drawn-out d/l, let me know and I'll re-up after I get the unrepresented epic stuff uploaded.
